readability_reflection: They both have their advantages. I think that concatenation is more readable than interpolation for example, “a” + b + “c” is clearer than “a{b}c”.
comprehension_debugging: There were some typos I think? so that was a challenge.
preference_rationale: I prefer concatenation, because its more fundamental than interpolation.  The “addition” is just clearer.
learning_curve: Because I have coded in multiple languages both are approachable as far as readability goes.
